title: Nightwing: Year One
description: The Nightwing: Year One storyline was published from March, 2005 to May, 2005 in the comic book series Nightwing. This story tells the history of Dick Grayson and his life after Batman fired him, as he gains advice from Superman, aids Deadman, and makes the decisions that lead him to become a new crimefighter.
author: Chuck Dixon, Scott Beatty
